whoa.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: used to tell someone to become calmer or to do something more slowly
whoa.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: said to show that you are surprised or that you think something is impressive
whoa.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Whoa. That’s a lot of money.
whoa.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: used to tell a horse to stop
